EXAMPLE.title: Show Keystate at the top of the screen

SECTION.DESC: Show the keystates at the top of the screen

CODE.RUBY:
def show_keystates_top margin = 10 height = 20 width = 20 right = Rho::System.screenWidth - margin
Rho::KeyState.showStates( { :top => margin, :right => right, :width => width, :height => height }) end
